page.topic: How to Find Controls in a Large UX Component
page.description: The Quick Find Genie is useful for finding controls in components with a large number of controls.
page.discussion: Editing a UX Component with a large number of controls can be difficult. The Quick Find genie makes it easy to locate the control you want to edit. Watch the video below to learn more.
